subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Glen Davis scored 17 points and Rajon Rondo added 12 assists as the Celtics routed the Magic and are a game away from their second N.B.A. finals in three seasons.
snippet: Glen Davis scored 17 points and Rajon Rondo added 12 assists as the Celtics routed the Magic and are a game away from their second N.B.A. finals in three seasons.
